scripts.figmagic: yarn figmagic:clean && yarn figmagic:saveFromApi && yarn figmagic:build && yarn figmagic:getImages && yarn figmagic:downloadImages
scripts.figmagic:clean: rm -rf specs/ && rm -rf tokens/ && rm -rf grid/ && rm -rf figma && mkdir tokens && cp .gridTemplate.mjs tokens/ && mv tokens/.gridTemplate.mjs tokens/grid.mjs
scripts.figmagic:tokens: yarn figmagic:clean && yarn figmagic:saveFromApi && yarn figmagic:build
scripts.precommit: echo Running pre-commit linting... && pretty-quick --staged && npm --no-git-tag-version version patch && git add package.json
